about_the_game:
Purchase the soundtrack to "Heart's Medicine - Hospital Heat".

Listen to the lovely singer/songwriter music from Keeley Bumford, Miranda Kalagian and Adam Gubman. From the emotional title track "Breathe" to the uplifting "Rise", the nostalgic "Wasted Time", the soft-spoken "Mathilda" and the hypnotizing "Reverie", all the game's originally composed, heartwarming tracks are here!

The impressive cinematic score to "Heart's Medicine - Hospital Heat", meanwhile, takes you through the whirlwind of emotions in this game. Composed by Adam Gubman, this score contains the touching gameplay music and theme, but also has a STEAM-EXCLUSIVE B-side with alternative versions, emotional tracks and new cuts of the previous songs.
